channel.title: 路透财经

item.title: 美国联邦航空管理局称，该局对波音公司和供应商 Spirit AeroSystems 公司进行的 737 MAX 生产审计发现，两家公司涉嫌多次违反制造质量控制要求
item.description:
The Federal Aviation Administration said the agency's 737 MAX production audit into Boeing and supplier Spirit AeroSystems found multiple instances where the companies allegedly failed to comply with manufacturing quality control requirements https://t.co/rtH1VT2mPj pic.twitter.com/lpVgxDjLLa

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观看：中国国务院总理李强宣布了雄心勃勃的2024年经济增长目标（5%左右），并承诺采取措施转变中国的发展模式，化解由破产房地产开发商和负债城市引发的风险。
item.description:
WATCH: Chinese Premier Li Qiang announced an ambitious 2024 economic growth target of around 5%, promising steps to transform the country's development model and defuse risks fueled by bankrupt property developers and indebted cities https://t.co/kkiHoFMrO0 pic.twitter.com/XW3fkpOatQ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 随着劳动力形势缓解，森那美种植园预计 2024 年产量将增加
item.description:
Sime Darby Plantation sees higher 2024 output as labour situation eases https://t.co/EeMkS6tZsQ pic.twitter.com/GUYdnAFI46

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 重返中国复苏股市的外国投资者表示，已公布的支出计划不足以扭转受挫的情绪，目前继续买入股票的主要原因是价格便宜。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Foreign investors returning to China's recuperating stock markets say spending plans announced are not enough to turn battered sentiment around, and the main reason to keep buying shares for now is because they are cheap. More here: https://t.co/hxPi6mTlgw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 中国誓言要建立其认为对未来竞争力至关重要的产业，从人工智能到太空，同时提出放开制造业和一些服务业的准入，以阻止外国投资者的撤退。更多内容请点击这里：
item.description:
China vowed to build up industries it sees as crucial to future competitiveness, ranging from artificial intelligence to space, while offering to free up access to manufacturing and some services sectors to stem a retreat by foreign investors. More here: https://t.co/E3c3bArNkN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 一些大型中国开发商将在英国出售更多房地产以筹集现金，房地产中介称，这将充分利用缓慢解冻的市场和押注经济复苏的买家。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Some big Chinese developers are set to offload more real estate in Britain to raise cash, property agents say, making the most of a slowly thawing market and buyers betting on a recovery. More here: https://t.co/Nk2z5SVnFG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观看：特斯拉 2 月份在中国的销量下降，股价下跌超过 7%。
item.description:
WATCH: Shares in Tesla fell more than 7% after its sales declined in February in China, where it faces growing competition from local rivals like BYD https://t.co/D28nXm31or pic.twitter.com/ZzaML000PU

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 强于预期的美国经济正在提振美元，这让那些押注美元将在一连串降息措施下萎靡不振的投资者感到沮丧。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
A stronger-than-expected US economy is buoying the dollar, frustrating investors who had bet the currency would wilt under a barrage of interest rate cuts that have yet to materialize. More here: https://t.co/HMogt4eyLN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 波音公司可能收购 Spirit AeroSystems 公司，同时推迟 737 MAX 喷气式飞机的增产计划，这将有助于该飞机制造商管理其供应链，但分析师表示，此举并不能快速解决其质量问题。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Boeing's possible takeover of Spirit AeroSystems, along with delaying plans to ramp up production of 737 MAX jets, could help the planemaker manage its supply chain, but the move is no quick fix for its quality problems, analysts said. More here: https://t.co/B5vpIoumVq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：由维托（Vitol）支持的储能公司 VTTI 即将从埃克森美孚（Exxon Mobil）和卡塔尔能源公司（QatarEnergy）手中收购意大利最大液化天然气进口终端的多数股权。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: Vitol-backed energy storage company VTTI is close to acquiring a majority stake in Italy's biggest liquefied natural gas import terminal from Exxon Mobil and QatarEnergy. More here: https://t.co/anFV9tuuaN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观看：由于投资者在经济数据和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔国会证词公布前稍作停顿，美国股市在一个波澜不惊的交易日后小幅收跌
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks ended slightly lower after a choppy trading day as investors took a pause ahead of economic data and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's congressional testimony https://t.co/rP85i19ovB pic.twitter.com/K3UjxB6G58

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024
